mapper.select: SELECT TZ_CD CD , TZ_NM CD_NM FROM NEO_TIMEZONE WHERE USE_YN = #{useYn} ORDER BY TZ_NM
SELECT DEPT_NO CD , DEPT_NM CD_NM FROM NEO_DEPT WHERE STATUS = #{status} ORDER BY DEPT_NM
SELECT AUTH_GRP_ID CD , AUTH_GRP_NM CD_NM FROM NEO_AUTH_GRP WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY AUTH_GRP_ID DESC
SELECT PROG_ID CD , PROG_NM CD_NM FROM NEO_PROG WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND UILANG = #{uilang} ORDER BY DISP_ORDER ASC, PROG_ID DESC
